title: Interview with Professor Tariq Modood (Part 2)
description: In this episode, Matthew continues his discussion with Tariq Madood, this time about Tariq's own research into Multi-culturalism and secularism. Tariq explains how true, effective multi-culturalism works and why there are often misconceptions regarding its effectiveness in Britain.
